publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2722 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Relevant Premises) Regulations 2005—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Relevant Premises) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry*

S2M-2722 Cathy Jamieson: The Draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Relevant Premises) Regulations 2005—That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that the draft Fire (Scotland) Act 2005 (Relevant Premises) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Hugh Henry
